data.name: InvalidPropertyAssign
data.value: The value "{0}" is not valid for property "{1}".

data.name: InvalidPropertyAssignWithAllowed
data.value: The value "{0}" is not valid for property "{1}. Only allowed "({2})"

data.name: PropertyListCannotContainsNullValue
data.value: The list "{0}" cannot contains null values

data.name: ValueMustBeGreaterThan
data.value: The property "{0}" must have an value greater than "{1}"

data.name: ValueMustBeLessThan
data.value: The property "{0}" must have an value less than "{1}"

data.name: ValueMustBeLessThanOrEqualTo
data.value: The property "{0}" must have an value less than or equal to "{1}"

data.name: ValueMustBeGreaterThanOrEqualTo
data.value: The property "{0}" must have an value greater than or equal to "{1}"

data.name: DefaultUnhandledErrorMessage
data.comment: Default message when exceptions are hidden from API responses

data.name: ExceptionMessageSeparator
data.comment: Separator used to split combined exception messages and traces

data.name: FieldDoesNotExistInEntity
data.value: The field "{1}" does not exist in the entity "{0}"
data.comment: Used when a requested field is not found on the entity type. Parameters (alphabetical): entityName, fieldName

data.name: NoMoreParametersAvailable
data.comment: Thrown when the a..z internal parameter pool is exhausted

data.name: OperatorOnlyForStringFields
data.value: The '{0}' operator can only be applied to string fields. Field '{1}' is of type '{2}'.
data.comment: Used when a string-only operator is applied to a non-string field. Parameters (alphabetical): comparisonOperator, fieldName, fieldTypeName

data.name: PropertyNotFoundOnType
data.value: Property '{0}' was not found on type {1}
data.comment: Used when the requested property does not exist on the target type. Parameters (alphabetical): propertyName, typeName

data.name: DatedNotificationTemplate
data.comment: Template for dated notifications. Parameters (alphabetical): message, timestamp

data.name: DatedNotificationTimestampFormat
data.comment: Format string for the timestamp used in dated notifications

data.name: ErrorPersistingData
data.value: An Error occurred when persisting data.
data.comment: Used when commit cannot proceed due to domain notifications

data.name: LogLabelDebug
data.comment: Log label for debug severity

data.name: LogLabelError
data.comment: Log label for error severity

data.name: LogLabelInformation
data.comment: Log label for information severity

data.name: LogLabelTrace
data.comment: Log label for trace severity

data.name: LogLabelWarning
data.comment: Log label for warning severity

data.name: UnableToCastTypeToTargetType
data.value: Unable to cast type "{0}" to target type "{1}".
data.comment: Used when casting the payload fails in ToTyped. Parameters (alphabetical): actualTypeName, targetTypeName

data.name: CollectionsNotSupportedFor
data.comment: Thrown when a collection-typed property is used in clause filters. Parameters (alphabetical): argumentName

data.name: InvalidComparisonOperator
data.comment: Used when an unsupported comparison operator is provided. Parameters (alphabetical): comparisonOperator

data.name: HandleAsyncReturnedNullOrInvalidTask
data.value: HandleAsync on type "{0}" returned null or invalid Task.
data.comment: Used when the handler's HandleAsync returns null or invalid Task. Parameters (alphabetical): typeName

data.name: NoHandlerRegisteredExpectedService
data.value: No handler registered. Expected service "{0}" for request type "{1}".
data.comment: Used when no request handler is registered. Parameters (alphabetical): handlerTypeName, requestTypeName

data.name: TypeDoesNotImplementHandleAsync
data.comment: Used when a type lacks a HandleAsync method. Parameters (alphabetical): typeName

data.name: EntityValidationKey
data.comment: Key used for entity validation notifications

data.name: ConfigurationTypeNotAssignableForEntity
data.value: Configuration type '{0}' is not assignable to '{2}' for entity '{1}'.
data.comment: Used when a mapping configuration type is incompatible with the expected generic configuration. Parameters (alphabetical): configurationTypeFullName, entityTypeFullName, expectedGenericFullName

data.name: EntityNotConfiguredInDbContext
data.value: The entity is not configured in the DbContext.
data.comment: Thrown when DbContext has no mapping for the entity type

data.name: PropertyMissingColumnMapping
data.value: The property '{0}' does not have a column mapping in the database.
data.comment: Thrown when a mapped, writable property lacks a database column. Parameters (alphabetical): propertyName

data.name: ColumnOrderMustBeDefined
data.comment: Thrown when the column order mapping is null

data.name: ColumnDoesNotExistInDataTable
data.value: Column '{0}' does not exist in the DataTable.
data.comment: Thrown when a column referenced in the order mapping is missing. Parameters (alphabetical): columnName

data.name: ParallelParametersMustBeGreaterThanZero
data.value: The parameters '{0}', '{1}', '{2}' and '{3}' must be greater than 0.
data.comment: Used when any of the parallel parameters is less than 1. Parameters (alphabetical): batchSize, maxDegreeOfProcessesPerThread, maximumDegreeOfParalelism, totalRegisters

data.name: TraceInitializingParallelism
data.comment: Trace title indicating the start of parallel execution

data.name: TraceParallelismDetails
data.comment: Trace details describing configured parallelism. Parameters (alphabetical): maxDegreeOfParallelism, maxDegreeOfProcessesPerThread

data.name: TraceTotalRecords
data.comment: Trace label for total items to process. Parameters (alphabetical): totalRegisters

data.name: TraceBatchSize
data.comment: Trace label for batch size. Parameters (alphabetical): batchSize

data.name: TraceTotalRequiredIterations
data.comment: Trace label for the total number of iterations/batches. Parameters (alphabetical): totalBatches

data.name: TraceProcessingIterationRange
data.comment: Trace title for a processing iteration range segment

data.name: TraceProcessingIterationRangeDetails
data.comment: Trace details showing the iteration start and end in relation to the total. Parameters (alphabetical): endIndex, startIndex, totalBatches

data.name: TraceQueryFinished
data.comment: Trace title indicating a single query task completed

data.name: TraceIterationLabel
data.comment: Label used to indicate the iteration number. Parameters (alphabetical): iterationIndex

data.name: EntityWithIdNotFound
data.comment: Thrown when a requested entity id is not found. Parameters (alphabetical): id

data.name: InvalidOrderDirectionInDynamicSort
data.value: Invalid order direction in dynamic sort.
data.comment: Thrown when an unknown sort order is used in dynamic sort

data.name: SomeEntitiesWereNotFoundIds
data.value: Some entities were not found, ids: {0}.
data.comment: Thrown when a set of ids do not match existing entities. Parameters (alphabetical): idsList

data.name: UnsupportedTypeForProperty
data.comment: Thrown when a property's type is not supported for selection binding. Parameters (alphabetical): propertyName, typeName

data.name: NoRegisteredContextFoundForKey
data.value: No registered context found for key '{0}'.
data.comment: Thrown when CommitAsync(key) is called and no context is registered for the given key. Parameters (alphabetical): key

data.name: NoWorkingContexts
data.comment: Thrown when the contexts list for a given key is null or empty.
